name: Captain Reylia Stormwave
title: Tavern Master
description: A bronze-scaled dragonborn with the bearing of a seasoned sea captain. Her tavern caters to sailors, merchants, and dock workers with strong drinks and hearty food.

greeting.first_time: Ahoy there! Welcome to the Salty Anchor. I'm Captain Reylia—ran ships for twenty years before opening this place. What'll it be?
greeting.returning: Back from the seas, are we? Good to see you!
greeting.tired: You look like you've been through a storm. A night's rest will sort you out.

off_duty.text: Just catching my breath before the evening crowd. The tavern's open—grab a seat downstairs!

rent_room.text: A bunk for the night? Port prices—60 gold. Includes breakfast and a sea view. You'll sleep like you're back on calm waters.
rent_room.success: Room's yours. Upstairs, third door. Sleep well, sailor.
rent_room.failure: Need 60 gold for a room. This is a port city—everything costs more.

buy_drink.text: Rum? Ale? We've got the strongest drinks this side of the harbor. 7 gold.

ask_about_entertainment.text: We've got music every night—keeps the sailors happy. Crusher at the door handles the bookings. He looks mean, but he's fair. Just don't try anything stupid.
